objects.specification: Large rectangular floor platform with a sleek dark gray matte finish, simulating a high-end showroom surface. It has a thin profile and slightly beveled edges to clearly delineate the booth area.

Tall vertical rectangular wall panel with a smooth matte white surface, forming the solid back boundary of the booth. The panel is flush with the floor and has crisp, clean edges for a professional exhibition look.
Tall vertical rectangular wall panel in smooth matte white finish, forming the left flank of the booth. It presents a clean backdrop and aligns perfectly with adjacent panels.
Tall vertical rectangular wall panel in smooth matte white finish, forming the right flank of the booth. It aligns flush with the floor and joins seamlessly with the back and left walls.

Realistic demo car model with modern sedan proportions and aerodynamic styling. It features a glossy red main paint with contrasting white and black accent details, along with highly reflective surfaces perfect for an exhibition display.
Rectangular registration desk with clean, modern lines. The top and side panels are accented in glossy red and white finishes, creating a welcoming focal point for visitor check-in.

Tall vertical banner panel displaying car branding and logos in a vibrant red, white, and black color scheme. The slender rectangular surface features high-resolution graphics without obstructing the view of the exhibit.

Tall vertical banner panel displaying car branding and logos in a vibrant red, white, and black color scheme. The slender rectangular surface features high-resolution graphics without obstructing the view of the exhibit.
Modern visitor chair with padded seat and backrest in black leather, supported by slender metallic legs. Designed for comfort during informal discussions in a trade-show environment.
Modern visitor chair with padded seat and backrest in black leather, supported by slender metallic legs. Designed for comfort during informal discussions in a trade-show environment.

Small round table with a clear tempered glass top supported by a single central chrome-finished metal pedestal, ideal for quick discussions and brochure placement.
Small round table with a clear tempered glass top supported by a single central chrome-finished metal pedestal, ideal for quick discussions and brochure placement.
Decorative pendant lighting fixture consisting of a slender cylindrical form with a warm yellow emissive surface, providing ambient overhead illumination.

Slim promotional leaflet stand with multiple brochure holders and a glossy metallic finish, designed to display informational materials attractively.

Decorative potted plant with lush green foliage contained in a modern cylindrical planter, adding a natural accent to the booth environment.
